channel.title: Delta Cleaned V 1.5 With Mysql
channel.description:
Delta Cleaned V 1.5 With Mysql ive also posted this on ragezone and rune-server
Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jr0jmlhmzdt]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jr0jmlhmzdt[/url]
v1.5 Features: - fixed ranging glitch - added npc clipped walking (did worldmap way) - globalitems.java - use it to spawn items on the ground - cleaned some more shit out - added some npc's to train on at home just so you can test out combat - same features as previoud versions - Mysql Loading And Saving Done By Me
v1.2 Features: - fixed ipban localhost if you logout then log back in - fix teleports - added a new anti-bot-spam system (allgofree bot) - removed a little bit more useless shit - removed crystal bow and crystal shield degrading (re-add if you want) - Simple dodian clean report system (moderator mute option too) - client.java is 403KB - you start off at edgeville - same features as previous version
Credits: Delta, me
Things removed from source v1: - bank pins - pest control (most) - fight caves (most) - Delta shops - Npc first clicking (most) - Mining (most) - Wcing (Most) - Jad minigame - Quests interfaces+requirments (Most) - commands except for the basics such as (banuser, ipban, ipmute, players, etc.) - barrows shit (most) - and other random shit
Things not removed v1: - Delta style combat (including rangeOnNpc, meleeOnNpc, pvp, nvp, etc.) - Prayer affects - Specials - Most skills (including thieving)
Bugs fixed v1: - fixed anti-leech null glitch - syi, agf bot, and null protection - log-in death - all known dupes have been fixed (including logout dupe + fast decline) - Fixed random char reseting - multi-barrage fix in multiplayer-zones
v1 bugs: - teleport glitch
Help Section: If you are wondering where Potions.java is, It's been renamed to ItemFunctions.java If you are wondering where ClickingMost.java is, It's been renamed to ActionButtons.java

item.title: Delta Cleaned V 1.5 With Mysql
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

I could basicly make Delta better. But Delta is for begginers. It will take me 1 day to get my server done and ready if i used delta. Plus why would you remove Jad. Thats a minigame everyone likes. Bank pins are good for saftey. And why would you rename the files.

You need to learn how to fix up this shit. Man… shit coders these days.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Cleaned V 1.5 With Mysql
item.dc:creator: @pkin3 pkin3
item.description:
@pkin3 wrote:

Delta Cleaned V 1.5 With Mysql
ive also posted this on ragezone and rune-server

Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jr0jmlhmzdt

v1.5 Features:

  • fixed ranging glitch
  • added npc clipped walking (did worldmap way)
  • globalitems.java - use it to spawn items on the ground
  • cleaned some more shit out
  • added some npc’s to train on at home just so you can test out combat
  • same features as previoud versions
  • Mysql Loading And Saving Done By Me

v1.2 Features:

  • fixed ipban localhost if you logout then log back in
  • fix teleports
  • added a new anti-bot-spam system (allgofree bot)
  • removed a little bit more useless shit
  • removed crystal bow and crystal shield degrading (re-add if you want)
  • Simple dodian clean report system (moderator mute option too)
  • client.java is 403KB
  • you start off at edgeville
  • same features as previous version

Credits: Delta, me

Things removed from source v1:

  • bank pins
  • pest control (most)
  • fight caves (most)
  • Delta shops
  • Npc first clicking (most)
  • Mining (most)
  • Wcing (Most)
  • Jad minigame
  • Quests interfaces+requirments (Most)
  • commands except for the basics such as (banuser, ipban, ipmute, players, etc.)
  • barrows shit (most)
  • and other random shit

Things not removed v1:

  • Delta style combat (including rangeOnNpc, meleeOnNpc, pvp, nvp, etc.)
  • Prayer affects
  • Specials
  • Most skills (including thieving)

Bugs fixed v1:

  • fixed anti-leech null glitch
  • syi, agf bot, and null protection
  • log-in death
  • all known dupes have been fixed (including logout dupe + fast decline)
  • Fixed random char reseting
  • multi-barrage fix in multiplayer-zones

v1 bugs:

  • teleport glitch

Help Section:
If you are wondering where Potions.java is, It’s been renamed to ItemFunctions.java
If you are wondering where ClickingMost.java is, It’s been renamed to ActionButtons.java
